About Us

PatientZero Security is an Indian based Cyber Security Services organization.

We focus on providing variety of security services for our clientâ€™s applications & infrastructure. Some of the Cyber Security services offered by us include Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing today known as VAPT, Red Team Attack Simulation and Source Code Review Assessments. We also provide customized security solutions as per the client needs. Our Team at PatientZero Security consists of Highly Experienced and Industry Certified Security Professionals each best at different level of technical skills. PatientZero Security, apart from being a CyberSecurity Services provider also conducts seminars and workshops in different Schools and Univerisites to spread awareness, about being a Smart and Secure Cyber User.
